Name: treatment of electronics scrap from control units | electronics scrap from control units | EN15804GD, U
Category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery
Description: manual dismantling of the electronics for control units, assuming that big metal pieces are recycled, big plastic parts incinerated, and that cables and PWB are recycled through further treatment steps.
